definition: to desensitize/to remove an allergic susceptibility

sentences.english: Zhao Min is a Chinese girl.

sentences.english: But my life is normal and I can't be paranoid.
sentences.chinese: 但是我的生活正常，我不會神過經過敏。

sentences.english: Maidens should (or must) be mild and meek, ft to hear and slow to speak.
sentences.chinese: 少女應溫良謙恭，敏於聽而慎於言。

sentences.english: Many sincere thanks to you, dear Min.
sentences.chinese: 真心地謝謝你，敏你在他鄉也好嗎？

sentences.english: The preparation technology of nickel paste and thick-film humidity sensitive resistor is introduced.

sentences.english: Wild Turkeys are masters of camouflage and evasion.

sentences.english: Ellen: People who like cats are much more discerning than people who like dogs, don't you think?
sentences.chinese: 喜歡貓的人比喜歡狗的人更聡敏，你不覺得嗎？

sentences.english: A painter must be an acute observer.
One of the key problems in the phase interferometer hydrophone is enhanced sensitivity and desensitization.
sentences.chinese: 相位調製型的關鍵問題之一是增敏和去敏。

sentences.english: The ammonia comes from firedamp fermentation has been determined by ammonium - gas - sensitive electrodes with satisfactory results.

sentences.english: The photo which we liked best in the Historic China group was taken by Zhao Min .

definition: Li ethnic group of Hainan Province/surname Li/abbr. for Lebanon 黎巴嫩[Li2 ba1 nen4]

surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
